column.name: soundingid
column.comment: record id field which is the autoincremented record counter in the header table

column.name: leveltime_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of time on each level

column.name: leveltype_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of type of level on each level

column.name: levelqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of level quality flag on each level

column.name: leveltimeqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of time of level quality flags on each level

column.name: pqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of pressure quality flags on each level

column.name: zqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of height quality flags on each level

column.name: tqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of temperature quality flags on each level

column.name: mqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of moisture quality flags on each level

column.name: wdwsqc_ind
column.comment: indicator for presence of wind quality flags on each level

column.name: time_level1
column.comment: time of the first level, in tenths of minutes. The hour plus this time is usually the release time

column.name: time_leveltop
column.comment: time o the top level. This plus the hour is the true time of the level
